issues.description: Empty default SECRET_KEY could lead to insecure deployments if not overridden
SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE default is False, allowing cookies over insecure HTTP
CSRF_COOKIE_SECURE default is False, allowing CSRF tokens over insecure HTTP
SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS is set to 0, effectively disabling HSTS protection
ValidationError.__hash__ sorts error_list by message attribute which may not be stable
build_absolute_uri may be vulnerable to open redirects if location contains '../'
bytes_to_text uses 'replace' mode for decoding, silently replacing invalid characters
Header encoding fallback uses sys.maxsize which could lead to excessively large headers
Resource closers are cleared after exceptions, potentially hiding resource leaks
HttpResponseRedirectBase.allowed_schemes is limited to ['http', 'https', 'ftp'], potentially too restrictive
